summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Twenty-fourth Avenue Northeast, from East Fifty-fourth Street to Blakly Avenue; Ravenna Avenue, from East Fiftieth Street to East Fifty-fourth Street; East Fifty-fourth Street and East Fifty-third Street, each from Ravenna Avenue to Twenty-fourth Avenue Northeast, and East Fifty-first Street, from Ravenna Avenue to Blakly Avenue, all in The City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 2023 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
